overview:
“Bill leads the sales team at LTSave. Bill has several years of sales management and business development experience at high-growth technology firms such as Brainshark, BuyerZone, Cerulean Technology, NewsEdge, and Wang Laboratories. He has a proven track record in handling major accounts in the financial industry.

Bill completed his Bachelor of Arts from the City College of New York. He resides in Sudbury, Massachusetts.” (Source: Invesra)
